text: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison is a 1957 American World War II drama movie directed by John Huston and based on the 1952 novel of the same name by Charles Shaw. It stars Robert Mitchum, Deborah Kerr and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1958. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1957 war movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
